content.text: Learn how to create a "fixed" menu with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a "fixed" menu with CSS.

content.text: How To Create a Fixed Top Menu

content.code:
Home   News   Contact
 

Some text some text some text some text..
content.code_html:
<div class="navbar">
  <a href="#home">Home</a>
  <a href="#news">News</a>
  <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
</div>

<div class="main">
  <p>Some text some text some text some text..</p>
</div>

content.text: To create a fixed top menu, use position:fixed and top:0 . Note that the fixed menu will overlay your other content. To fix this, add a margin-top (to the content) that is equal or larger than the height of your menu.
content.html: To create a fixed top menu, use position:fixed and top:0. Note that the fixed menu will overlay your other content. To fix this, add a margin-top (to the content) that is equal or larger than the height of your menu.

syntaxHighlighting.text:
/* Set 
  the navbar to fixed position */
/* Position the navbar at the top of the page */

margin-top: 30px; /* Add a top 
  margin to avoid content overlay */

/* Add a top 
  margin to avoid content overlay */

syntax_highlighting.text:
/* Set 
  the navbar to fixed position */
/* Position the navbar at the top of the page */

margin-top: 30px; /* Add a top 
  margin to avoid content overlay */

/* Add a top 
  margin to avoid content overlay */

content.code_html:
/* The navigation bar */
.navbar {
  overflow: hidden;
  background-color: #333;
  position: fixed; /* Set the navbar to fixed position */
  top: 0; /* Position the navbar at the top of the page */
  width: 100%; /* Full width */
}

/* Links inside the navbar */
.navbar a {
  float: left;
  display: block;
  color: #f2f2f2;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 14px 16px;
  text-decoration: none;
}

/* Change background on mouse-over */
.navbar a:hover {
  background: #ddd;
  color: black;
}

/* Main content */
.main {
  margin-top: 30px; /* Add a top margin to avoid content overlay */
}

content.text: How To Create a Fixed Bottom Menu
To create a fixed bottom menu, use position:fixed and bottom:0 :
content.html: To create a fixed bottom menu, use position:fixed and bottom:0:

syntaxHighlighting.text: /* Set the navbar to fixed position */
/* Position the navbar at the bottom of the page */
margin-bottom: 30px; /* Add a bottom margin to avoid content overlay */
/* Add a bottom margin to avoid content overlay */

syntax_highlighting.text: /* Set the navbar to fixed position */
/* Position the navbar at the bottom of the page */
margin-bottom: 30px; /* Add a bottom margin to avoid content overlay */
/* Add a bottom margin to avoid content overlay */

content.code_html:
/* The navigation bar */
.navbar {
  position: fixed; /* Set the navbar to fixed position */
  bottom: 0; /* Position the navbar at the bottom of the page */
  width: 100%; /* Full width */
}

/* Main content */
.main {
  margin-bottom: 30px; /* Add a bottom margin to avoid content overlay */
}
